mapper.sql: id, name, number, address, amap_longitude, amap_latitude, gps_longitude, gps_latitude, remark,status,create_by,create_time,imei,device_id,verify_code,psk,Activated,installer,'-' as status_name, device_model,company_name,agreement_status,contact_info,product_id,device_project
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.number, p.address, p.amap_longitude, p.amap_latitude, p.gps_longitude, p.gps_latitude, p.remark,p.status,p.create_by,p.create_time,p.imei,p.device_id,p.verify_code,p.psk,p.Activated,p.installer,s.desc as status_name, device_model,company_name,agreement_status,contact_info,product_id,device_project from ammeter_position p ,ammeter_status s where p.status = s.code and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from ammeter_position where imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != 3

select p.id,p.device_id, p.name, p.number, p.address, p.amap_longitude, p.amap_latitude, p.gps_longitude, p.gps_latitude, p.remark,p.status, s.desc as status_name,IFNULL(info.`status`,2) as work_status, p.create_by,p.create_time,d.type,p.imei,p.installer,p.device_project, case when f.id is null then '0' else '1' end as warning_status, case when f.id is null then '' else f.warning_desc end as warning_desc from ammeter_position p INNER JOIN ammeter_user u on p.create_by = u.id INNER JOIN ammeter_status s on p.status = s.code INNER JOIN ammeter_device d on p.imei= d.imsi left JOIN ammeter_working_info info on d.id = info.ammeter_id LEFT join (select w.* from ammeter_warning w, (select max(id) id from ammeter_warning where warning_status = 0 group by ammeter_id) e where w.id = e.id ) f on f.ammeter_id = d.id WHERE p.status !=3
and u.channel_id =#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and p.imei like CONCAT('%',#{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and p.address like CONCAT('%',#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by p.create_time desc

select p.id,p.device_id, p.name, p.amap_longitude, p.amap_latitude, p.remark, s.desc as status_name, p.imei, case when f.id is null then '0' else '1' end as warning_status, case when f.id is null then '' else f.warning_desc end as warning_desc from ammeter_position p INNER JOIN ammeter_user u on p.create_by = u.id INNER JOIN ammeter_device d on p.imei= d.imsi INNER JOIN ammeter_status s on p.status = s.code LEFT join (select w.* from ammeter_warning w, (select max(id) id from ammeter_warning where warning_status = 0 group by ammeter_id) e where w.id = e.id ) f on f.ammeter_id = d.id WHERE p.status !=3
and u.channel_id =#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ammeter_position set status =1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ammeter_position (name, number, address, amap_longitude, amap_latitude, gps_longitude, gps_latitude, remark,create_by,create_time,imei,installer,device_model,company_name,agreement_status ,contact_info,device_project) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amapLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amapLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deviceProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ammeter_position
name,
number,
address,
amap_longitude,
amap_latitude,
gps_longitude,
gps_latitude,
remark,

mapper.update:
update ammeter_position
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amap_longitude = #{amapLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amap_latitude = #{amapLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_longitude = #{gpsLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_latitude = #{gpsLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installer = #{installer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verify_code = #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
psk = #{psk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Activated = #{Activated,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_status = #{agreementStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_info = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_project = #{deviceProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ammeter_position set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amap_longitude = #{amapLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amap_latitude = #{amapLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_longitude = #{gpsLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_latitude = #{gpsLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update ammeter_position set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
